data.name: HeroDescription
data.value: Professional quality management training for your organization

data.name: HeroMainHeading
data.value: Implementation, audits, and training for quality systems

data.name: HeroSubheading
data.value: We guide organizations through the entire ISO 9001, ISO 14001, ISO/IEC 17025, ISO 15189, HACCP, ISO 45001, ISO 27001, IATF 16949, and ISO 13485 lifecycle — from analysis to certification.

data.name: HeroUSP1
data.value: Seasoned auditors and consultants with years of experience

data.name: HeroUSP1Title
data.value: Expert auditors and consultants on your team

data.name: HeroUSP1Description
data.value: Lead auditors with 20+ years of practice from certification bodies and industry projects guide your implementation.

data.name: HeroUSP2
data.value: Practical know-how drawn from real-world audits

data.name: HeroUSP2Description
data.value: Our recommendations build on dozens of passed certifications across manufacturing, laboratories, and services.

data.name: HeroUSP3
data.value: Internal workshops delivered directly at your company

data.name: HeroUSP3Description
data.value: We tailor training, consulting, and internal audits to your processes and bring the right experts to your location.

data.name: HeroCorporateCardDescription
data.value: Start with a short qualification questionnaire to receive a tailored proposal from a senior auditor.

data.name: HeroCoursesCardDescription
data.value: Browse the catalogue with powerful filters, wishlist and date alerts.

data.name: HeroSearchPlaceholder
data.value: Search for a course, tool, or skill…

data.name: StepSelectDescription
data.value: Perform a gap analysis, map your processes and identify areas that need improvement.

data.name: StepRegisterDescription
data.value: Build a training plan for your team, schedule the internal audit and assign responsibilities.

data.name: StepPayDescription
data.value: Prepare the documentation, coordinate the certification audit and guide everyone through the process stress-free.

data.name: RecommendedEmpty
data.value: Select a standard and goal above to see tailored course suggestions.

data.name: RecommendedForYou
data.value: Courses recommended for your certification journey

data.name: SpecializationsDescription
data.value: We deliver comprehensive consulting and training for the following standards.

data.name: IsoStandardsDescription
data.value: We cover assessment, implementation, and team training for the key ISO, HACCP, and accreditation standards.

data.name: Iso9001Description
data.value: Quality management focused on processes, risks, and customer satisfaction from the first analysis to the certification audit.

data.name: Iso14001Description
data.value: Systematically reduce environmental impact, comply with regulations, and establish measurable sustainability goals.

data.name: Iso17025Description
data.value: Support for testing and calibration laboratories with documentation, metrology, and competence management.

data.name: HaccpDescription
data.value: Food safety management and control of critical points in production, gastronomy, and logistics with a focus on prevention.

data.name: Iso45001Description
data.value: Modern occupational health and safety management preventing incidents, managing risks, and engaging employees.

data.name: Iso27001Description
data.value: Information security, cyber-risk management, and compliance with GDPR and customer security requirements.

data.name: ProcessHeading
data.value: How we guide you to successful certification

data.name: ProcessDescription
data.value: We lead you through every milestone – from the initial gap analysis to implementation and the final certification audit.

data.name: ProcessStep1Description
data.value: We assess the current state, define the project scope, and prepare a plan with clear activities, owners, and deadlines.

data.name: ProcessStep2Description
data.value: Together we configure documentation, processes, and metrics, train your team, and conduct the internal audit.

data.name: ProcessStep3Description
data.value: We prepare you for the certification visit, accompany the auditor, and assist with corrective actions if needed.

data.name: CtaDescription
data.value: Contact us to design the right mix of training, consulting, and internal audits tailored to your organization.

data.name: CoursesDescription
data.value: Choose from the most in-demand courses that help you meet standard requirements and move your team forward.

data.name: TrustCertificate
data.value: Certificates included with selected courses. Graduates receive official confirmation as auditors / internal auditors.

data.name: TrustGuarantee
data.value: We guarantee successful certification or refund your tuition

data.name: WhyChooseDescription
data.value: 20 years of experience, a team of external auditors, and know-how from dozens of industries.

data.name: AboutHeading
data.value: Your trusted partner for ISO and HACCP management systems

data.name: AboutDescription
data.value: For more than 20 years, we have been helping manufacturing companies, laboratories, and healthcare facilities design, implement, and maintain certified management systems. Our consultants combine the practice of lead auditors with hands-on experience from dozens of industries.

data.name: AboutBulletConsulting
data.value: End-to-end support from the first gap analysis to a successful certification audit.

data.name: AboutBulletTraining
data.value: Accredited training for quality managers, auditors, and technical teams.

data.name: AboutBulletCare
data.value: Long-term care, internal audits, and updates whenever the standards change.

data.name: ContactDescription
data.value: We are happy to answer your questions and help you choose the right training.

data.name: ContactAddressValue
data.value: Systémy jakosti s.r.o., Antala Staška 1859/34, 140 00 Prague 4, Czech Republic

data.value: You can compare up to 3 courses.
